source.title: Getting Started | Biome
source.description: Installation via npm/pnpm/bun/deno/yarn, `biome init` for `biome.json`, CLI commands `format`, `lint`, `check` with `--write`, editor extensions (VS Code, IntelliJ, Zed), `biome ci` for CI pipelines, ESLint/Prettier migration.

source.title: Configure Biome | Biome
source.description: `biome.json`/`biome.jsonc` structure, `formatter.enabled`/`linter.enabled`/`assist.enabled` toggles, language overrides (`javascript.formatter`, `json.formatter`), auto-discovery resolution, `files.includes` glob patterns with `!`/`!!` negation syntax, tool-specific includes, VCS integration, well-known JSON files.

source.title: First-party extensions | Biome
source.description: Official editor integrations for VS Code, IntelliJ, and Zed: marketplace installation, format-on-save setup, `Format Document With` command palette configuration, default formatter selection.

source.title: VS Code extension | Biome
source.description: VS Code extension: single-root/multi-root workspaces, `Format Document`, `Format Selection`, `editor.formatOnSave`, `source.fixAll.biome`, `source.organizeImports.biome`, settings `biome.enabled`, `biome.lsp.bin`, `biome.requireConfiguration`, `biome.configurationPath`, LSP trace troubleshooting, 2.x migration.

source.title: Integrate Biome with your VCS | Biome
source.description: Git VCS integration: `vcs.enabled`, `vcs.clientKind`, `vcs.useIgnoreFile` for `.gitignore`/`.ignore` files, `--changed` with `vcs.defaultBranch` or `--since`, `--staged` option for processing staged files before commits.

source.title: Continuous Integration | Biome
source.description: CI setup: `biome ci` vs `biome check` (no `--write`, GitHub annotations), `biomejs/setup-biome` GitHub Action, `reviewdog-action-biome` third-party, GitLab CI with `--reporter=gitlab` code quality reports.

source.title: Git Hooks | Biome
source.description: Git hooks: Lefthook `pre-commit`/`pre-push` with `stage_fixed`, Husky with lint-staged/git-format-staged, pre-commit framework hooks (`biome-ci`, `biome-check`, `biome-format`, `biome-lint`), `--staged`, `--no-errors-on-unmatched`, shell scripts.

source.title: Philosophy | Biome
source.description: Project ethos: clear expectations, public decision communication, helpful error messages with fixes, specific errors, API optimisation, code documentation, verbose naming, inclusive terminology, generic client support, unambiguous terminal output.

source.title: Language support | Biome
source.description: Language support matrix: JavaScript (ES2024), TypeScript (5.6), JSX, TSX, JSON, JSONC (`allowComments`, `allowTrailingCommas`), HTML, Vue/Svelte/Astro (experimental), CSS, GraphQL, GritQL. Parsing, formatting, linting, plugin support status.

source.title: Configuration | Biome
source.description: Complete `biome.json` schema reference: `$schema`, `extends`, `root`, `files.includes`/`maxSize`, `vcs` settings, `linter.rules` groups, `formatter` options (`indentStyle`, `lineWidth`), `javascript`/`json`/`css`/`graphql`/`html` language settings, `overrides` patterns, glob syntax.

source.title: Reporters | Biome
source.description: CLI `--reporter` formats: `summary`, `json`, `json-pretty`, `github` (workflow annotations), `junit` XML, `checkstyle` XML, `rdjson`. Controls diagnostic and violation output for CI/CD integration.

source.title: useSortedClasses | Biome
source.description: Nursery rule `useSortedClasses` for Tailwind CSS utility class sorting. Configure `attributes` and `functions` options for `clsx`/`cva`/`tw` template literals. Unsafe fix, uses default Tailwind algorithm.

source.title: Linter | Biome
source.description: Configuring `biome.json` linter: enable/disable rules, severity levels (`off`/`on`/`error`/`warn`/`info`), rule groups (`a11y`, `style`, `suspicious`), domains, safe/unsafe fixes, `--write` `--skip` `--only` flags, LSP integration, ESLint migration.
